properties.script:
#!python3

from ipaddress import ip_network
import json
import re

from pprint import pprint


def get_ioc(ioc):
    if ioc:
        return {"ioc": ioc}


def is_ip_ioc(ioc):
    is_valid_ip = False
    version = 0
    is_host = False
    ioc_sanitized = ""
    try:
        network = ip_network(ioc)
    except ValueError as error:
        # print(f"{error = }")
        pass
    else:
        is_valid_ip = True
        version = ip_network(ioc).version
        if network.num_addresses == 1:
            is_host = True
            ioc_sanitized = str(network.network_address)
        else:
            is_host = False
            ioc_sanitized = str(network)
    finally:
        return is_valid_ip, version, is_host, get_ioc(ioc_sanitized)


def is_sha256_ioc(ioc):
    is_valid_sha256 = re.fullmatch(r"^[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$", ioc)
    return is_valid_sha256, get_ioc(ioc)


def is_url_ioc(ioc):
    url_pattern = "URL:"
    is_valid_url = ioc.startswith(url_pattern)
    ioc_sanitized = ioc.lstrip(url_pattern)
    return is_valid_url, get_ioc(ioc_sanitized)


def is_domain_ioc(ioc):
    domain_pattern = "DOMAIN:"
    ioc_sanitized = ""
    is_valid_domain_pattern = ioc.startswith(domain_pattern)
    if is_valid_domain_pattern:
        ioc_sanitized = ioc.lstrip(domain_pattern)
    is_valid_domain_rgx = re.fullmatch(r"(?=^.{4,253}\.?$)(^((?!-)[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,63}(?<!-)\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,63}\.?$)", ioc)
    if not is_valid_domain_pattern and is_valid_domain_rgx:
        ioc_sanitized = ioc
    is_valid_domain = is_valid_domain_pattern or is_valid_domain_rgx
    return is_valid_domain, get_ioc(ioc_sanitized)


def get_iocs_from_list(email_lines):
    # _email_iocs = [ioc for ioc in email_lines if ioc and ioc.strip("")]
    email_iocs_set = set(ioc for ioc in email_lines if ioc and ioc.strip(""))
    print(f"\nemail iocs set".upper())
    pprint(email_iocs_set)
    ipv4_host_iocs = []
    ipv4_network_iocs = []
    ipv6_host_iocs = []
    ipv6_network_iocs = []
    sha256_iocs = []
    url_iocs = []
    domain_iocs = []
    uncategorised_iocs = []
    for email_ioc in email_iocs_set:
        is_valid_ip, version, is_host, ip_ioc = is_ip_ioc(email_ioc)
        if is_valid_ip and version == 4 and is_host and ip_ioc not in ipv4_host_iocs:
            ipv4_host_iocs.append(ip_ioc)
        elif is_valid_ip and version == 4 and not is_host and ip_ioc not in ipv4_network_iocs:
            ipv4_network_iocs.append(ip_ioc)
        elif is_valid_ip and version == 6 and is_host and ip_ioc not in ipv6_host_iocs:
            ipv6_host_iocs.append(ip_ioc)
        elif is_valid_ip and version == 6 and not is_host and ip_ioc not in ipv6_network_iocs:
            ipv6_network_iocs.append(ip_ioc)
        else:
            is_valid_sha256, sha256_ioc = is_sha256_ioc(email_ioc)
            is_valid_url, url_ioc = is_url_ioc(email_ioc)
            is_valid_domain, domain_ioc = is_domain_ioc(email_ioc)
            if is_valid_sha256 and sha256_ioc not in sha256_iocs:
                sha256_iocs.append(sha256_ioc)
            elif is_valid_url and url_ioc not in url_iocs:
                url_iocs.append(url_ioc)
            elif is_valid_domain and domain_ioc not in domain_iocs:
                domain_iocs.append(domain_ioc)
            else:
                # if get_ioc(email_ioc) not in domain_iocs:
                #     domain_iocs.append(get_ioc(email_ioc))
                # if get_ioc(email_ioc) not in url_iocs:
                #     url_iocs.append(get_ioc(email_ioc))
                if get_ioc(email_ioc) not in uncategorised_iocs:
                    uncategorised_iocs.append(get_ioc(email_ioc))
    iocs = {
        "ipv4_host_iocs": ipv4_host_iocs,
        "ipv4_network_iocs": ipv4_network_iocs,
        "ipv6_host_iocs": ipv6_host_iocs,
        "ipv6_network_iocs": ipv6_network_iocs,
        "sha256_iocs": sha256_iocs,
        "url_iocs": url_iocs,
        "domain_iocs": domain_iocs,
        "uncategorised_iocs": uncategorised_iocs,
    }
    print("\niocs".upper())
    pprint(iocs)
    return iocs


def get_valid_ioc_lines(message):
    start = -1
    end = 0
    lines = message.splitlines()
    for index, line in enumerate(lines):
        if line == "IOC START":
            start = index + 1
            break
    for index, line in enumerate(lines):
        if index > start and line == "IOC END":
            end = index - 1
            break
    valid_lines = lines[start:end]
    print(f"\nvalid lines".upper())
    pprint(valid_lines)
    return valid_lines


# ioc_email_body = """Todays IOC LIST

# Veniam excepteur sit laboris eiusmod eiusmod excepteur. Excepteur ut anim ullamco laborum consectetur nulla sunt laborum consequat esse cupidatat culpa id. Quis nulla magna nulla ea sunt incididunt aliqua nulla ipsum. Velit ea qui eu non ipsum consectetur. Reprehenderit in est culpa eiusmod quis fugiat voluptate est.


# IOC START
# dc6c:48fe:bbce:1752:c782:ec5a:ddd8:108f

# 2001:DB8:0:CD30::/60

# e7c21ec7cc7467bb450f456322d360e1bbb5c1c4a508bd9f926c3629733a4b1a
# 2.2.2.2
# example.org
# 1.1.1.1


# 2.2.2.2/32
# scanme.org
# 1.1.1.0/24
# 1.1.1.1/32


# 9b4bf41c4ac7447355218b18ec739c834bdfd7c80b6d7dd6973558b416ea7b9d


# 6f41:9211:8930:24b9:1eeb:3dea:a3e0:4121
# f0cea78678a2d147cbaa510cf72e11d7009d6ca569135ccd6977f33870380a1d
# URL:http://internetbadgys.com/to/path
# URL:http://scanme.org//to/path/regex/?bad=true*

# IOC END
# Minim eiusmod quis qui adipisicing excepteur. Ad irure amet culpa tempor officia cillum. Tempor deserunt excepteur cupidatat consequat consequat labore laborum eu deserunt dolor excepteur ea laboris. Amet reprehenderit mollit velit magna consectetur in non ex enim nostrud. Deserunt qui laboris dolor qui. Cupidatat voluptate ipsum anim nisi labore sunt cillum cupidatat id officia.


# ---------------------------------------------------------
# Thanks & Regards
# Manish Gaurav
# Security Consulting Engineer
# CX Security APJC Professional Services
# Standard Business Hours: 10 am – 7 pm IST
# Email: magaurav@cisco.com


# """

valid_ioc_lines = get_valid_ioc_lines("""$trigger.triggerevent_01ZU29BDTQGWU1mOtoFyzxOgPMfyCl72wV3.output.message$""")
iocs = get_iocs_from_list(valid_ioc_lines)

ipv4_host_iocs = json.dumps(iocs["ipv4_host_iocs"])
ipv4_network_iocs = json.dumps(iocs["ipv4_network_iocs"])
ipv6_host_iocs = json.dumps(iocs["ipv6_host_iocs"])
ipv6_network_iocs = json.dumps(iocs["ipv6_network_iocs"])
sha256_iocs = json.dumps(iocs["sha256_iocs"])
url_iocs = json.dumps(iocs["url_iocs"])
domain_iocs = json.dumps(iocs["domain_iocs"])
uncategorised_iocs = json.dumps(iocs["uncategorised_iocs"])

properties.script:
#!python3

import json
from ipaddress import ip_network
from pprint import pprint


def get_ioc(ioc, kind):
    return {"kind": kind, "value": ioc}


def is_ip_ioc(ioc):
    is_valid_ip = False
    version = 0
    is_host = False
    ioc_sanitized = ""
    network = ip_network(ioc)
    is_valid_ip = True
    version = ip_network(ioc).version
    kind = f"IPv{version}"
    if network.num_addresses == 1:
        is_host = True
        kind = f"{kind}Address"
        ioc_sanitized = str(network.network_address)
    else:
        is_host = False
        kind = f"{kind}Network"
        ioc_sanitized = str(network)
    return is_valid_ip, version, is_host, get_ioc(ioc_sanitized, kind)


def get_updated_members(current_members, new_iocs):
    new_members = []
    for ioc_dict in new_iocs:
        ioc = ioc_dict["ioc"]
        _, _, _, new_member = is_ip_ioc(ioc)
        if new_member not in current_members:
            new_members.append(new_member)
    return new_members


current_members = $activity.definition_activity_0204WYPHPE6F17K2cROmwbT0uaOe9cIUTir.output.jsonpath_queries.Literals$
iocs = $activity.definition_activity_01ZYNPJEBFZZM78SwBshQWG8UfgvSIjgYma.output.script_queries.iocs$

# current_members = [
#     {"kind": "IPv4Network", "value": "1.1.1.0/24"},
#     {"kind": "IPv4Address", "value": "1.1.1.1"},
#     {"kind": "IPv4Address", "value": "2.2.2.2"},
#     {"kind": "IPv4Network", "value": "21.1.1.0/24"},
#     {"kind": "IPv4Network", "value": "21.2.2.0/24"},
#     {"kind": "IPv4Address", "value": "3.3.3.3"},
#     {"kind": "IPv4Address", "value": "4.4.4.4"},
# ]
# iocs = {
#     "domain_iocs": [{"ioc": "scanme.org"}, {"ioc": "example.org"}],
#     "ipv4_host_iocs": [{"ioc": "1.1.1.1"}, {"ioc": "2.2.2.2"}],
#     "ipv4_network_iocs": [{"ioc": "1.1.1.0/24"}],
#     "ipv6_host_iocs": [
#         {"ioc": "6f41:9211:8930:24b9:1eeb:3dea:a3e0:4121"},
#         {"ioc": "2001:db8::db8:800:200c:417a"},
#         {"ioc": "dc6c:48fe:bbce:1752:c782:ec5a:ddd8:108f"},
#     ],
#     "ipv6_network_iocs": [{"ioc": "2001:db8:0:cd30::/60"}],
#     "sha256_iocs": [
#         {"ioc": "9b4bf41c4ac7447355218b18ec739c834bdfd7c80b6d7dd6973558b416ea7b9d"},
#         {"ioc": "f0cea78678a2d147cbaa510cf72e11d7009d6ca569135ccd6977f33870380a1d"},
#         {"ioc": "e7c21ec7cc7467bb450f456322d360e1bbb5c1c4a508bd9f926c3629733a4b1a"},
#     ],
#     "uncategorised_iocs": [{"ioc": "1.1.1.1/32"}, {"ioc": "2.2.2.2"}, {"ioc": "DOMAIN:scanme.org"}],
#     "url_iocs": [{"ioc": "http://scanme.org//to/path/regex/?bad=true*"}, {"ioc": "http://internetbadgys.com/to/path"}],
# }

print(f"\current members".upper())
pprint(current_members)


ipv4_host_iocs = iocs["ipv4_host_iocs"]
ipv4_network_iocs = iocs["ipv4_network_iocs"]
ipv6_host_iocs = iocs["ipv6_host_iocs"]
ipv6_network_iocs = iocs["ipv6_network_iocs"]

new_iocs = []
[new_iocs.extend(ioc_lst) for ioc_lst in (ipv4_host_iocs, ipv4_network_iocs, ipv6_host_iocs, ipv6_network_iocs)]
print(f"\nnew iocs".upper())
pprint(new_iocs)

new_members = get_updated_members(current_members, new_iocs)
updated_iocs = []
[updated_iocs.extend(ioc_lst) for ioc_lst in (current_members, new_members)]
print(f"\nupdated iocs".upper())
pprint(updated_iocs)

updated_members = json.dumps({"members": updated_iocs})
